data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Rajbari.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajbari, Dhaka, Bangladesh

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Rajbari. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,048,485 lost in Rajbari that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 1,315 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jogi (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Rajbari, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Rajbari, Dhaka, Bangladesh a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Rajbari access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Rajbari
location.people_groups_list: Jat Atra, Kasar (Hindu traditions), Kahar (Muslim traditions), Kaghazi, Karadar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Atra (4,000), Kasar (Hindu traditions) (6,900), Kahar (Muslim traditions) (4,000), Kaghazi (2,200), Karadar (2,400)
